title: Chapter 4336 - Chapter 4336: 4335 — Perfect Possession
body:
Chapter 4336 - Chapter 4336: 4335 — Perfect Possession

Chapter 4336: 4335 — perfect possession

Translator: 549690339

“Mo Sha, refine this wisp of energy and wrap it around your body.”

Wang Xian moved his palm and a wisp of energy appeared in his palm.

It flew to Mo Sha.

“It’s the Dragon King!”

Mo sha nodded and started to refine it immediately!

It was still extremely difficult to refine a wisp of chaotic energy.

Time passed by minute by minute. A few thousand years later, the Wisp of chaotic energy was completely refined by Mo Sha.

However, a few thousand years in the primal Chaos Stone was only a few decades in the outside world!

“Dragon King, the refinement is successful!”

Mo sha wiped the sweat off his forehead and said to Wang Xian!

“Alright, try to wrap this energy around your entire body.”

Wang Xian continued to instruct Mo Sha.

Mo Sha nodded his head and moved that wisp of energy bit by bit.

Infusing his body with the energy of the power of chaos.

Time passed little by little again.

Wang Xian stared at Mo sha as his eyes sparkled.

“It’s about time!”

Wang Xian saw that Mo Sha’s aura was tainted with the power of chaos. He took out the divination lamp and continued his divination.

The current demonic fiend had traces of the power of chaos on its body.

And the power of Chaos originated from the primal chaos stone.

This primal chaos stone once possessed a terrifying fusion power.

At that time, a divine dragon of ten attributes that Wang Xian created was absorbed perfectly in an instant.

Wang Xian didn’t even have the slightest ability to resist.

Furthermore, he was almost fused by this primal chaos stone.

Fortunately, the system had warned him to use up a large amount of resources to open up the Dragon Palace, allowing him to escape.

Otherwise, Wang Xian would have already disappeared.

He had already fused with this primal chaos stone and survived in another way.

In this way, Wang Xian had no consciousness. It was equivalent to another form of death.

The characteristics of the power of chaos could turn everything into chaos. Everything could also turn into chaos.

With a trace of the power of chaos, could this form of possession achieve perfection?

Very soon, the lamp of divination gave Wang Xian a result.

Wang Xian’s eyes revealed a hint of excitement.

The perfection of possession had reached 99.99% .

This was already considered a perfect form of possession.

“Mo Sha, carry out the possession immediately!”

Wang Xian’s eyes glowed as he instructed mo sha.

“It’s the Dragon King!”

Mo Sha nodded his head and looked at the embryo.

The half-liquid body entered the embryo and began the possession!

Wang Xian stared at it intently.

“Ah!”

Mo Sha entered the embryo and quickly absorbed everything from the demon.

The demon who had been in a deep sleep was suddenly invaded into the core. At the moment of life-and-death crisis, he woke up.

Feeling that he was rapidly losing control of the embryo, he let out a terrified scream.

“Who are you?”

“You dare to possess me?”

“Do you know what a great existence I am?”

The demon’s sharp voice rang out. His voice was filled with fear!

“Damned ant, you dare to possess me? Die!”

“Ah, what is this? What is this?”

“No, no, no. My last hope of resurrection. No, no, no, don’t possess me. Don’t kill me. I can do whatever you want!”

“I can be your slave. I can be your slave. Don’t kill me!”

In the embryo, the demon’s voice went from anger to fear to despair.

Finally, it turned into a plea.

Wang Xian looked at it coldly from the side. His eyes were sparkling!

“What kind of energy is this? Why Can’t I resist it? No!”

When the last scream was heard.

The embryo slowly released a wave of energy.

This was an energy that Wang Xian was very familiar with.

The Scream came to an abrupt end. The demon was replaced.

Just like how Mo Sha and the rest used to parasitize other living beings, they were able to receive everything from them perfectly.

Memories, opportunities, and aptitude.

The Devil Man was an existence with the darkness attribute, and so was Mo Sha.

This was because waves of energy were surging out from the embryo.

This energy belonged to Mo Sha.

He had completely eliminated his original body from the embryo.

This was because, compared to everything about the Devil Man, everything about Mo Sha was a impurity.

As long as one had consciousness, everything else would be abandoned.

This was a true possession, a perfect possession!

Buzz

When Wang Xian saw this scene, he waved his arm and an elemental god fragment appeared in his hand.

The Darkness Attribute Elemental God fragment was emitting a powerful energy.

Wang Xian controlled the energy of the elemental god fragment and slowly poured it into the embryo.

The entire embryo was absorbing it rapidly.

It was like a sponge, absorbing the energy at a terrifying speed.

At the same time, the embryo grew bigger and turned into the appearance of Mo Sha.

Wang Xian moved his palm again and took out all the god of elements fragments with the darkness attribute in his hand and placed them beside Mo Sha.

There were a total of four pieces of God of elements fragments with the darkness attribute.

These four pieces of God of elements fragments were extremely valuable.

To any large sect, they were all rare treasures.

Mosha was rapidly absorbing them, and the energy in his body was also growing rapidly.

His aura quickly reached the peak of the ruler realm.

However, all of this did not stop.

Mosha had inherited everything from the demon, and it was also a perfect possession.

This was equivalent to him being a demon, and the demon was him.

The Devil Man was originally a Great Dao level powerhouse.

A powerhouse at this level would cultivate again after death without any shackles.

As long as there was enough energy, he could recover quickly.

With enough resources, he could quickly recover to the Great Dao level.

Now that he had the energy of the Elemental God fragment, without shackles, mosha could quickly improve.

The peak of the ruler realm was just the beginning.

Very soon, a surge of energy gushed out from Mo Sha’s body.

His strength had directly reached the initial stage of the Heaven’s origin creation realm.

Naturally, there was no need for the quota of the Heaven’s origin creation realm for the powerhouses to come back from the dead to cultivate again.

When Mo Sha broke through to the Heaven’s origin creation realm, he didn’t even use up a single fragment of the god of elements.

The energy of the surrounding fragments of the god of elements continued to surge into his body.

Wang Xian exited the primal chaos stone and sensed it with a smile in the outside world.

In the future, besides him, the Dragon Palace would also have top-notch heaven origin creation-level powerhouses.

Along with Lin Niu and Xiao Lan, the Dragon Palace’s strength was not weak.

However, from Wang Xian’s point of view, it was not too strong.

He was not satisfied.

According to what he knew, there were about ten heaven origin creation-level powerhouses in old man Jian’s sword sect.

The Dragon Palace was still lacking.

They still needed to continue to nurture them!

“If the demonic fiend can reach the Great Dao level, I can consider sweeping across the entire starry universe. Even little white and the rest have broken through!”

Wang Xian thought to himself as a look of anticipation appeared on his face.

However, if the demonic fiend wanted to recover to the Great Dao level, it would require a lot of energy. It was too huge!
